channel.title: Bizarre Physics On Surface Tension
channel.description: [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/272844811408910043/7762FC540C389F19159A3D1B00F109E7869AC1C0/[/img] It might just be an artifact of the cheap-n-cheaty way in which I made it through this level, but it seems there is an invisible tank-sized object behind the actual tank, which is somehow connected to those two traffic cones up near the light pole. If I run into it, I'll be pushed back slightly and one of the cones will make a large cloud of collision dust like a stuck prop. Eventually (by the time I took the screenshot) the cone wiggled itself free, and the area behind the tank suddenly became passable.

item.title: Bizarre Physics On Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
1920×1080

It might just be an artifact of the cheap-n-cheaty way in which I made it through this level, but it seems there is an invisible tank-sized object behind the actual tank, which is somehow connected to those two traffic cones up near the light pole. If I run into it, I’ll be pushed back slightly and one of the cones will make a large cloud of collision dust like a stuck prop. Eventually (by the time I took the screenshot) the cone wiggled itself free, and the area behind the tank suddenly became passable.
